verses.content: Mi tin an chunga rorêltuhai thu thuin um raw se. Pathien thu loin tukhawm rorêltu an um ngai si nawh a; rorêltua umhai hi Pathien iruot an nih.
Chuleiin, tûkhawm rorêltu kal chu Pathien iruot kal a nih; a kaltuhai chun anni chungah rorêlna hmûng an tih.
Rorêltuhai chu thil ṭha thaw- tuhai ta ding chun ṭium an ni nawh a, thil ṭha naw thawtuhai ta ding ruok chun ṭium an nih. Anleh, rorêltu ṭi loa um i nuom am? Thil ṭha thâw la, a înpâk hlâwng i tih;

ama chu i ṭhatna dinga Pathien rawngbâwltu a ni sih a. Nisien- lakhawm, thil suol i thaw chun ṭi rawh, kâwlhnâm chu a chawi mei mei si nawh a; ama chu Pathien rawng- bâwltu, thil suksuoltuhai chunga lunginsenna phuba latu a ni sih a.
Chuleiin, lunginsenna ṭi lei chau ni loin, i sie le ṭha hrietna lei khawmin rorêltu thu thuin i um ding a ni hrim a nih.
Hi lei hin annâwm sie khawm in chawi hlak; chuong ang thil ngei thaw fan fan dinga Pathien rawng- bâwltuhai an ni sih a.
Mi po po kuomah pêk ding taphawt chu pe ro; leiman pêkna ding kuoma chun leiman pe unla, sie chawina ding kuoma chun sie chawi unla, ṭi ding chu ṭi unla, inza ding chu inza ro.
Inhmangai tuona ngawt naw chu tû iengkhawm bat naw ro; mâni mihriempui hmangaitu chun dân chu a zâwm famkim ta sih a.
Hieng, “Uire naw, tuol that naw, inru naw, inhnar naw,” ti le thupêk danghai hrim hrim hi, “Nangma în hmangai angin i vênghai i hmangai ding a nih,” ti hin a khai khâwm vawng a nih.
Hmangainain vênghai a suk- khawhlo ngai nawh a, chuleiin hmangaina hi dân hraw famkimna a nih.

Tulai thil umzie in hriet lei le, inhai ta dingin innaa inthawkin ṭhanghar a hun ta takzet ti in hriet leiin chu chu ka hril a nih; tuhin chu ei awi phut lai nêk khan chu ei sandamna chu a hnai lem ta sih a.
Zân hi a bo vâng vâng tah a, khuo a var ding a ni tah, chuleiin inthimna thilthawhai chu pei inla, var thuomin inthuom ei tiu khai.
Sûna um angin mawitakin um ei tiu, zu dâwn buoi le zu inruia um loin, hur le indit hmanga um loin, insuol le inîtthîka um loin,
Lalpa Isu Krista chun inthuom lem unla, in tisa inhâwkna puitlin dingin iengkhawm insiem naw ro.
